This is not HD by any definition of the word and should not be in this section, like most of YIFY torrents.  The file size to quality ratio is great and I can't fauly YIFY for that but as always it is NOT HD. 

It's even tagged as 1080p... WHY? it's not even 720p as it says in the title! it's 1280x536.

I think TPB seriously needs a HD section as well as the current 'Hi-Res' page... one where the files MUST meet the resolution requirement for the people in first world countries with fast and ulimited bandwidth who care more about quality than a small filesize. 

TLDR: Good quality for filesize but is absolutely not high definition  or comparable at all to 7 Gig 1080p movies.

As usual people want to bitch and moan over YIFI quality. I haven't downloaded this yet but I can vouch for his other work.  It is good work. Yes the audio isn't surround sound. But for watching on my PC the audio is just fine for his stuff. Now if your planning on burning it off or something so you can watch it on your HDTV then yes you need to download one from another uploader. Just for the better audio.

Only on rare occasions with his videos have I noticed any issues with the picture.  Before someone says his stuff isn't HD. Educate yourself on what HD is. 720p is HD.  Most blueray rips of movies are in the movies actual movie aspect ration. Meaning the majority are not 16:9.
